- react-custom-roulette requires React 18 but project uses React 19
- legacy-peer-deps allows installation despite peer dependency mismatch

\)")

feat: add mobile responsive design

- Add responsive CSS for tablets \(≤768px\) and mobile \(≤480px\)
- Dynamically adjust wheel size based on screen width \(280px/380px/500px\)
- Adjust slot machine dimensions and font sizes for mobile
- Update button styles and layout for better mobile UX
- Improve readability with responsive font sizes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
design: redesign slot machine with clean and unified style

- Unified design for all slot items \(same font size and style\)
- Add bold border frame in center using ::before pseudo-element
- Simplify color scheme \(white bg, purple accent\)
- Remove unnecessary animations \(pulse effect\)
- Maintain consistent design across all items

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
